name: Police on Duty
description:
The city is in danger. Hooligans began to attack everywhere. Welcome in the action-racing game of Police on Duty. It's your chance to keep order in the city!

As a policeman, your mission will be to catch as many offenders as possible. Literally, you have to eliminate the bad guys with a good equiped police car by destroying them all. Don`t worry for the car because everything is done for a better city. Good Luck and take care!

Game Features :
- 3 Equiped police cars
- Daily Bonus
- Limited time to complete the missions
